alert.note: Alert for Clark; Grant; Hamilton; Haskell; Kearny; Meade; Morton; Seward; Stanton; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 28 at 2:33AM CST until February 28 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Critical Risk of Wildfire Spread Tuesday Afternoon... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON CST /11 AM MST/ TODAY TO 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 061, 062, 074, 075, 076, 084, 085, 086, 087, AND 088... * AFFECTED AREA...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 061 Hamilton, Fire Weather Zone 062 Kearny, Fire Weather Zone 074 Stanton, Fire Weather Zone 075 Grant, Fire Weather Zone 076 Haskell, Fire Weather Zone 084 Morton, Fire Weather Zone 085 Stevens, Fire Weather Zone 086 Seward, Fire Weather Zone 087 Meade and Fire Weather Zone 088 Clark. * WINDS...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 13 percent. * IMPACTS...Given the ongoing drought and widespread dry dormant fuels, any ignitions Tuesday afternoon will have the potential to burn out of control quickly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Grant; Hamilton; Haskell; Kearny; Meade; Morton; Seward; Stanton; Stevens
